title: Central Dogma, Protein Synthesis in Eukaryotes 3

content.question: The central dogma does not apply to some viruses. Select a specific virus or type of virus and explain how it deviates from the central dogma.

frqParts.text: The central dogma does not apply to some viruses. Select a specific virus or type of virus and explain how it deviates from the central dogma.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
